## AspectContext interface

AOP Aspect execution context (Join Point). Provides a unified interface to access and modify method execution context.

Inspired by Spring's ProceedingJoinPoint, this context object: - Ensures parameter consistency across all aspect types (Before, Around, After) - Provides immutable access to original parameters - Allows controlled parameter modification - Includes method and target metadata

Note: In aspect implementations, this is typically named "joinPoint" to align with AOP terminology and avoid confusion with Koa's context in the koatty framework.

  AspectContext

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface AspectContext 
```

## Example


```typescript
@Aspect()
export class LoggingAspect implements IAspect {
  app: any;

  async run(joinPoint: AspectContext, proceed?: Function): Promise<any> {
    console.log('Method:', joinPoint.getMethodName());
    console.log('Args:', joinPoint.getArgs());

    // Modify arguments
    const args = joinPoint.getArgs();
    args[0] = args[0].trim();
    joinPoint.setArgs(args);

    if (proceed) {
      return await proceed();
    }
  }
}
```

## Methods

<table><thead><tr><th>

Method


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[executeProceed(errorHandler)](./koatty_container.aspectcontext.executeproceed.md)


</td><td>

Execute the proceed function to continue the execution chain.

⚠️ \*\*IMPORTANT\*\*: This method can ONLY be called in Around/AroundEach aspects! Calling it in Before, After, BeforeEach, or AfterEach aspects will throw an error at runtime.

This method automatically uses the current arguments from the context, so any modifications made via setArgs() will be reflected in the method execution.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[getApp()](./koatty_container.aspectcontext.getapp.md)


</td><td>

Get application instance reference.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[getArgs()](./koatty_container.aspectcontext.getargs.md)


</td><td>

Get the current arguments (may have been modified by previous aspects). Returns a reference to the mutable arguments array.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[getMethodName()](./koatty_container.aspectcontext.getmethodname.md)


</td><td>

Get the name of the intercepted method.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[getOptions()](./koatty_container.aspectcontext.getoptions.md)


</td><td>

Get custom options passed from the decorator.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[getOriginalArgs()](./koatty_container.aspectcontext.getoriginalargs.md)


</td><td>

Get the original arguments passed to the method (immutable). This provides access to the arguments before any aspect modifications.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[getTarget()](./koatty_container.aspectcontext.gettarget.md)


</td><td>

Get the target object instance being intercepted.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[hasProceed()](./koatty_container.aspectcontext.hasproceed.md)


</td><td>

Check if proceed is available (i.e., this is an Around aspect).


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[setArgs(args)](./koatty_container.aspectcontext.setargs.md)


</td><td>

Set new arguments for the method execution. This will affect subsequent aspects and the original method.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
